promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, short, single-word name for a chibi young rare swan water-type pokemon wearing blue and white gemstones. It can be found in lake-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, water or swan. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Glimbluen, a a chibi young rare swan water-type pokemon. It can be found in lake-like environments It has the following abilities: Icicle Punch, Copy. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "swan", "water" or "Glimbluen". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of water-type pokemon, swan-like, rare, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, gleaming bubble background
generatedDescription: Found in serene bodies of liquid, this petite feathered creature amuses itself by replicating lake dwellers. It can launch icy jabs when threatened.
